CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03C03

TITLE.P: Vocational Norwegian with work training — Østfold

SHORT_DESCR.P: The aim of the course is to strengthen participants' knowledge and skills in work related Norwegian, in particular as regards the chosen branch/place for work training. The aim is to get participants into work or to strengthen participants' options for starting self-financed studies. The participants shall start at their work training place based on the abovementioned aim from course week 7. The participant is followed-up, in accordance with the training plan, by an employee at the work training place and the companies are compensated for this follow-up work. The tenderer is to ensure that the training plan is followed and that the participants get together weekly in the course premises, where the main focus shall be individually adapted, vocational orientated Norwegian training.

TITLE.P: Vocational Norwegian with work training — Askim

SHORT_DESCR.P: The aim of the course is to strengthen participants' knowledge and skills in work related Norwegian, in particular as regards the chosen branch/place for work training. The aim is to get participants into work or to strengthen participants' options for starting self-financed studies. The participants shall start at their work training place based on the abovementioned aim from course week 7. The participant is followed-up, in accordance with the training plan, by an employee at the work training place and the companies are compensated for this follow-up work. The tenderer is to ensure that the training plan is followed and that the participants get together weekly in the course premises, where the main focus shall be individually adapted, vocational orientated Norwegian training.

AC_QUALITY.AC_CRITERION: Quality (including professional qualifications of the offered instructors, the content of the service, assignment comprehension)

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The contract is valid for the period 1.1.18 — 31.12.18. The Contracting Authority (the Customer) has the option to extend the contract for a further 1 + 1 + 1 year.

INFO_ADD.P: Tenderers will be assessed in the following way: Tenderers will be given a total grade for the award criteria quality on a scale from 0 to 100 points, with 100 being the best. The total number of points for quality will be divided by the price. The tender with the highest total score has the best relationship between price and quality and will win the competition.
